mapper.sql: id, machine_type, machine_function, machine_param, machine_attribute, user_id, used_duration, machine_brand, cooperation_mode,create_time, machine_status, machine_work_time_once, machine_provice_id,machine_provice, machine_city_id,machine_city,online_status,lastlogin_time,lock_status,store_id,other_parm
mapper.insert:
insert into machine_info
machine_type,
machine_function,
machine_param,
machine_attribute,
user_id,
used_duration,
machine_brand,
cooperation_mode,
create_time,
machine_status,
machine_work_time_once,
machine_provice_id,
machine_provice,
machine_city_id,
machine_city,
online_status,
lastlogin_time,
lock_status,
store_id,
other_parm,

mapper.update:
update machine_info
machine_type = #{machineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_function = #{machineFunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_param = #{machineParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_attribute = #{machineAttribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
used_duration = #{usedDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
machine_brand = #{machineBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime, jdbcType=DATE},
cooperation_mode = #{cooperationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_status = #{machineStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_work_time_once = #{machineWorkTimeOnce,jdbcType=INTEGER},
machine_provice_id = #{machineProviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_provice = #{machineProvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_city_id = #{machineCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
machine_city = #{machineCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
online_status = #{onlineStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lastlogin_time = #{lastloginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lock_status = #{lockStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
other_parm = #{otherParm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from machine_info t where t.machine_param=#{machineParam}
select from machine_info t where t.user_id=#{id}
select FROM machine_info t where t.user_id=#{id}
select FROM machine_info t where t.store_id=#{sid}
select from machine_info t where t.user_id=#{userId}
select machine_type ,count(*) as counts from machine_info GROUP BY machine_type
select machine_provice ,count(*) as counts from machine_info GROUP BY machine_provice
